website_summaries.verdict: Effectively holds exactly one cup of sugar and is resistant to breaking. This product will keep sugar dry and ready for use.
pros: With a classic look and feel, this shaker is practical in terms of use and will last the duration even if used for products other than sugar
cons: The dispenser is made of a heavy plastic despite its resemblance to glass

customer_reviews.title: BOTTOM BROKE OFF, SUGAR EVERYWHERE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely in love with this UNTIL THE BOTTOM FELL OFF!! Sugar flew over my entire kitchen and into every crack. I think I'll never have the mess completely cleaned. A week later and I'm still finding sugar. Why would Oxo make a solid bottom dispenser?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L White

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: Received last Friday. Tossed it in the trash today. After one washing the spout cover would not stay closed. So, the "two silicone seals" will NOT "keep cream or milk fresh". First bad OXO product I've ever had, and I've had a lot of them. Bought two of them at once. I'm hoping the second one lasts a bit longer ...
customer_reviews.author: Tom Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at first-- good size and I liked the spout, not too big or small. Then one day I picked it up and the bottom just fell off! Really weird. I didn't drop it or anything. Don't buy this. There's obviously some manufacturing flaw. I'd give this no stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Flygirl

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I bought a second one for Cinnamon Sugar! No mess, no fuss. Easy to clean. Easy to fill. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good solution
customer_reviews.text: I make my own French vanilla creamer. I was storing it in a mason jar which was messy to pour and the rim got gross over time. This is the perfect solution. Rocker style top is easy to open one handed, no drip spout, not to mention it's cute. It holds about one cup. I thought this was glass, but it's heavy duty plastic. That's my fault for not reading more carefully. It's so useful that I don't even mind.
customer_reviews.author: kmt22

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of the dispenser will fail
customer_reviews.text: In the process of making my morning coffee I gave the dispenser a shake to loosen up the caked up bits of sugar. All of a sudden the bottom dropped out and I ended up with a cup of sugar all over my feet. Oxo was an easy decision for kitchen products- not so much anymore. For a company that prides itself on design this is a huge fail.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick C Lam

customer_reviews.title: Should have listed to other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I received this item without any damage to the outer packaging, but when I opened it up, the bottom was already cracked off. Curiously, the cracked off bottom was sitting atop the silver (top) portion of the item, so I think it was broken before even shipping out. I'd recommend you listen to other reviewers and not purchase the plastic version of the sugar dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated.
customer_reviews.text: It leaked the first time I tried to use it. Obviously it is not one solid piece. There is a seam between the very bottom piece and the side or top piece, does not move so cannot tighten. It is leaking along that seam. $10 for a piece of plastic that leaks. Not worth the aggravation of returning. I can't get the video here to show how badly it leaks. If I could rate lower than one star, I would. Kind of as useful as a bucket with a hole. I contacted the manufacturer by email to express my displeasure. I did not ask for a replacement or a refund. They sent a replacement anyway. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RAMONAJO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for throwing sugar across the room.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you love cleaning sugar from your table or countertops... The open and close mechanism is horrendous. Sugar flys out when closing. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave NYC

customer_reviews.title: A decent, three-season sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this when I started using it. However, once the summer hit, this has become unusable. The dispenser allows air in and the sugar just clumps and will not pour out. And, this is in a climate controlled home. Also, the top does not seal (at least, with the glass version) so sugar gets into the grooves of the glass, making it difficult to get the top off and difficult to clean. I am back to using a small air-tight container for my daily dose of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: I have always been pleased with OXO equipment. Not so with this cream dispenser. The lid, which they do not recommend washing in the dishwasher, is very difficult to clean. I've found mold growing in the round stopper on the underside of the lid, underneath the o-ring, and most recently in the back "jaw" section of the flip up lid. None of these spots are easy to clean, whether using sponges, cloths or brushes. We'll be replacing it with something easier to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Dogberry

customer_reviews.title: This is not glass it is plastic
customer_reviews.text: This item is obviously plastic not glass. I even returned it and told them and they still sent me another plastic one. Do not pay the extra money for glass you will not get glass!
customer_reviews.author: kristen giauque

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep sugar fresh and hygienic!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I use it for the sugar. It prevents people from introducing a wet spoon into the sugar container causing sugar rocks. It is also very hygienic. I just wish the pouring would come from the top so that I can be able to see how much Im pouring. The way the pouring part is located doesnt allow me to see how much is coming out. So now instead of pouring into my coffee directly, I pour it into a spoon to control the amount Im adding.
customer_reviews.author: RomiNation

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the glass sugar dispenser by OXO. My main use for this item is pouring a little sugar in my coffee. This dispenser works as expected. I washed it before first use and apparently didn’t let it dry all the way before adding sugar. The next morning a lot of the sugar was clumped up. So make sure you let this dry completely before adding sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: So tired of fighting with the cardboard salt container and that stupid metal spout. I bought this for when I cook. Easy pour to measure. Easy to refill salt shakers. No muss, no fuss. Seals well. Yes, I know it's meant for sugar but I use it for salt. I live in a high humidity state and usually add some grains of rice to my salt shakers to keep the salt from getting stuck together. Obviously, I couldn't do that here....and it didn't matter. No clumping! It's attractive and easy to keep clean. I imagine it would work equally well with sugar. I would buy this brand again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: 'OXO' rarely disappoints, but they did with this creamer. Crud collects at the spout which really does not seal completely and the item needs to be cleaned every two days with a brush to remove the gunk at the spout and bottom of the glass, Narrow shape does not let a hand get inside. I'm surprised 'OXO' messed this one up so badly, but they did. Please be careful: Even if carefully kept in the fridge, you will notice pink bacteria forming on the spout where the milk has poured, unless you wash the top after every use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heron

customer_reviews.title: No drips, no mess & no PLASTIC bottle!
customer_reviews.text: We buy the half-gallon size of organic half & half for use in our coffee. Pouring from a newly opened half-gallon carton is a real mess! We wanted a glass creamer dispenser we could keep refilling. This OXO dispenser is perfect -- easy to fill, easy to wash, and best of all, no drips or mess!
customer_reviews.author: Lou(c)

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT Small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen pictures of the glass bottom breaking off. That occurs if you choose glass. I chose plastic. I like the looks and the amount sugar you can pour without having to shake it. Two cons: •It’s small If you have a family of four I’d want two of these or one with twice the capacity to hold sugar. •The was in formation whether this is dishwasher safe, so I’ll wash it by hand. For me that’s not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: Drip-free Controlled Pours
customer_reviews.text: Who would think that a small item like this could enhance your life to the degree that it does! Using this, it's very easy to pour just the right amount of half-and-half into our coffee. Best of all, it does it drip free. No more having to wipe down the carton or having rings left at the base. It really is a joy to use. Some reviewers reported that the spout would pop up, but we haven't had that issue at all. It stays shut snugly for storing in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: allstrings

customer_reviews.title: Very nice with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: I would give the creamer a perfect 5 if it had a better seal when closed, if you turn the bottle upside down the liquid will spill out wish the seal would tighten when closed other than that its a nice product that I will keep, hope OXO comes out with a better seal.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: This is fairly big for stuff like sugar and will last you a while without having ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for a make-shift cafe we put up at our church. We were originally just using a bowl and a spoon, but that got messy quickly and it was such a pain to put sugar back and forth between containers. This is fairly big for stuff like sugar and will last you a while without having to refill it. The only thing is you tend to pour a lot with the spout so just be careful if you just want a little bit. In terms of quality I love OXO products, I feel like they're made well and purposefully.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: I love OXO but this product is poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I love OXO but this product is poorly made. The pout doesn’t even open and close anymore bc sugar gets all in the cracks. Very disappointing for OXO. I also noticed that the sugar is clumping so it’s getting moisture in from somewhere. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: giggles

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected...
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty much what I expected. The plastic they use for both the lid and containers are pretty solid. As you can see from the picture, I have two. I use one for sugar and the other for powdered creamer. They work fine other than gumming up a bit at the tip when using for coffee, but that's not the dispenser's fault. I would definitely recommend these to anyone that needs simple dispensers in the kitchen for their coffee. =)
customer_reviews.author: ChaosKnign

customer_reviews.title: Beware of moisture
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to prevent moisture from getting into the sugar from normal humid weather. It’s not sealed at all. However, if you don’t have humid weather on a regular basis, the sugar won’t harden and then pours out easily
customer_reviews.author: C. Montejo

customer_reviews.title: Looks like glass, but didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Sugar clumps, moisture gets in and the top spout doesnt open all the way. Will be returning. I was debating over getting this item versus getting glass and I am glad that I ended up choosing plastic. I actually forgot what I had ordered and had to tap it on the counter and look up to verify I actually had ordered the plastic one instead of glass this item definitely has good quality to it so far. We only just got at but so far we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Marie

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Creamer
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with my purchase. I hated the dripping and mess with creamer containers from the store, bottles or cartons. This container hasn’t dripped at all. It is glass and you can see how much cream you have left and dispenses like a dream. Also looks great. Absolutely do not believe any reviews that claim the creamer doesn’t seal. It absolutely does.
customer_reviews.author: pkdesign

customer_reviews.title: Nice creamer - Packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: Shipping may be a problem with this. They come in a light foam sleeve to protect it and that is all. The sleeve came undone on the first one and the spout was cracked when I got it. The glass is extremely thick and didn't really need any protection, the plastic is/was brittle thus producing the broken spout. This creamer is a perfect accessory for the refrigerator. It has a stopper that seals well. I like this item
customer_reviews.author: DMH2000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dispenser - Easy To Use - Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to dispense our Monkfruit sugar which is NON hypoglycemic. The Monkfruit sugar looks and tastes exactly like sugar and pours just like sugar. With that said, this OXO Dispenser is excellent and the spout opens and closes so one doesn't spill sugar (or Monkfruit) all over the table. Simple to use. Easy to clean and it looks nice on the table. Buy one! It's great!
customer_reviews.author: S_Richards

customer_reviews.title: Sugar everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sugar dispenser so that I wouldn't get sugar all over the place. This one does not help at all. The steam from the coffee causes the sugar to clump in the opening making it hard to close and maintain a clean sideboard. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money seemed like a nice heavy plastic creamer, got to carry small thing of creamer with me to work, does not seal tight, Lid well flip open and leak and if you don't use it within several days it will mold, thought maybe at first it was just the plain cream but then tried coffee creamer and it so molded really bad, it was hard to clean the first time this time just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stucki

customer_reviews.title: ... item because I've always found OXO to be a good product. While it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I've always found OXO to be a good product. While it looks nice, after using it just a short while the bottom just fell off and now it's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a plastic dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: happy to find this. don't know why it is so difficult to find in a brick and mortar store a sugar dispenser in PLASTIC that also has and opening that can stay closed. bought this for mom, who often drops things due to a poor grip so I needed plastic. some dispenser the top has holes in it and she wanted something that would seal closed. the few stores that had a decent dispenser had glass only. this Oxo offered glass and plastic. shipping was fast. she is pleased and that helps, saved me from a wild goose chase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for Cardboard Carton Creamer
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase creamer in cardboard cartons without a plastic pour spout, then you need this product. It prevents those nasty crusty creamer chunks from forming on the cardboard spout and getting into your coffee. I got this and it changed my life. Now, when I get a new carton of creamer, I put it into this little contraption and I never have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sir E.

customer_reviews.title: You might not get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. However, I cannot give this higher than 2 stars due to the fact that I didn’t receive what I ordered. I decided to spend the extra few dollars for the glass dispenser since I generally prefer glass and glass tends to hold up better than plastic. What arrived to my house was the plastic dispenser so basically I spent more money to get the lesser product. Didn’t feel it was worth the hassle of returning. The plastic one works well enough but definitely would have preferred the glass.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to store my coffee creamer. I hate the cartons! Works great. Easy to refill and use. Only problem I have is cleaning the gasket that seals the container. I have placed it in my top rack dishwasher and it comes out perfect. I wash it once a week. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sugar dispenser to put in my office. I needed a dispenser that closed completely to keep away ants and that also was easy to poor. I love the modern design of this dispenser and the stainless steel top. I also like that it is made out glass instead of cheap plastic. The only con that I have noticed with this dispenser is that the spout tends to get sugar caught in it and will not shut completely without having to clean the sugar out.
customer_reviews.author: C. AmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle, but not for condensed milk
customer_reviews.text: When I searched for condensed milk dispenser, this came up, but this is not the best for condensed milk since it's so thick. It takes forever to come out. This bottle is very nice though and it matches my OXO sugar dispenser. I'm using it for fish sauce instead and it works great. But I deducted a star since I can't use it for the purpose I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the use for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this creamer dispenser to dispense condensed milk. It was not very easy to use. I then placed evaporated milk in the dispenser and it worked a lot better. But I really had no use for evaporated milk as much. I could use the dispenser for regular half and half. But then I could easily leave half and half in the carton for use.
customer_reviews.author: Objectively

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for us
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sugar dispenser for my mom. It is really cute but (as many other reviewers have noted) the sugar granules gets trapped in the sides of the spout, making it very hard to open and close it- impossible for arthritic hands. The dispenser Itself is quite small so it needs to be refilled often. If you are looking for a glass dispenser then look elsewhere. My mom threw it out after a couple of months. I think this is a case where I should have stuck with the good old-fashioned $4 dispenser. Another reviewer commented that this would be better suited for a product like sugar in the raw and I think that was a fantastic idea.
customer_reviews.author: Kym77

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: I agree with several other reviewers that it gets difficult to open after just a few uses and I have strong hands and 0 arthritis for your reference, the sugar also clumps after a day of which I didn't have this problem with my generic diner shaker I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Yocum

customer_reviews.title: So small and clogs easily
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how small this dispenser is. It has to be filled very often due to the small size. My son really hates it because when he tried to pour the sugar into his coffee, the steam rising from the coffee clogs the container. I'm searching now for a better one. Lost my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: mallory0405

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but could use some tweaks
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this sugar pour dispenser however, sugar does get stuck in the spout along the sides. Almost like it needed a rubber washer around the perimeter. When the sugar gets stuck in the edges it may attract ants especially since we live on the beach and ants love the sandy beach so we just have to be sure to clean well when we’re using this.
customer_reviews.author: Taush

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic glass. Great container.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and perfect for refrigerator storage. Wish the container would hold a full can of milk as it is just a couple of ounces too small. Also the glass is noticeably molded in half. Not a big issue but for those perfectionists who may want to know. Not sure in this day and age why they have to mold together two pieces of glass.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to keep my light cream fresh. I also like that it's attractive enough to put on the table. I have not had any problems with the lid not closing as others have mentioned. Perhaps this is because I never put the top in the dishwasher. Whatever the case I love it.
customer_reviews.author: WhoAmI?

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The container is plastic and lacks that heavier feel. Sugar accumulates around the spout and I have to push it hard to close. The sugar clumps up inside and forms a solid piece. I think glass would have kept it much drier. I will keep this item but I can’t say I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Spring lid pops open every time
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but doesn't work nicely. The spring lid doesn't stay down. It's less than one month old and the lid pops back open on its own, every time. When pouring, the cream spills down the side, too.
customer_reviews.author: oddwee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect creamer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for exactly this, without knowing it, for months! I have looked at countless creamers and finally landed on this. So glad to have come across this milk dispenser. Fits easily on the refrigerator door shelf and in my hand. Easy to use and clean. Makes me happy every time I see it!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a sugar dispenser for my coffee bar. It doesn’t hold much, so I have to refill it quite often. The little spout that closes is useless. If you close it, you can barely get it to open back up. When you unscrew the top to refill it, you better be over the sink or trashcan because sugar goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong with the four star review it’s just that the steam from the coffee causes the sugar to stick to the little spout and wind pushing the spout in an out it does get sticky and gritty With sugar. Overall I do like the size it doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Makes your morning easier
customer_reviews.text: Finally found what I had been missing. I bought the creamer & sugar set together & now feel like my coffee taste better:) Pros- easy to use, fill & clean. Cons- could use a larger size on the creamer, we seem too refill it a lot. Note, the sugar dispenser is plastic - creamer is glass. Both work well
customer_reviews.author: Janet H. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, have had it for 1 1/2 years now. No complaints! I was worried about it tipping (glass) onto our countertops and breaking but that’s never happened. It’s sturdy. Easy to fill. Sugar never clumps. Makes life easier so it’s a win for me!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kimes

customer_reviews.title: Teeny tiny itsy bitsy
customer_reviews.text: This would be a wonderful sugar container if it was just bigger! It is Tiny! Maybe 6 in tall? I went through sugar in about 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Carla May

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different things to keep this thing clean. Boiled it regularly in a pot of water. Dishwasher. Still the cream spoils way too fast. I really regret buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Min Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for montessori kindergarten environment
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my waldorf/montessori home school environment. I got my boys (age 5 and 3) a cereal dispenser and got this creamer to put the milk in so that they can easily take it and pour in the milk into the cereal bowls themselves. Not to heavy and the cap closes and opens easily and is very secure. I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Work well for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Hubby kept dropping lids on sugar bowls. Blame it on early mornings or how much coffee he drinks. Tried another type of dispenser, but it clogged up. These work well for sugar and creamer. They do not clog and close to prevent any risk of attracting bugs. Purchased glass because I do not care for plastic. Hopefully they will not be dropped. We have had these for several months, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Previously brought these at bed bath and beyond and could not find them again there- I put coffee grounds in it’s full Kurig filters- works great then I am not dealing with the coffee bags- I got more to have multiple flavors of coffee available
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Reichle

customer_reviews.title: Wished it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 9oz plastic model January of 2016. Sugar has been clumping for awhile now and we didn’t understand why. Today when I washed it I noticed the water seeped out of the bottom. The bottom is actually a separate piece molded to the body of the container. It’s no longer air or even water tight. I just ordered the larger glass model and will see if it last longer. Overall I had liked it, just wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: P. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: ❤️FINALLY... a cream dispenser💙
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this product FOREVER! An attractive, non-drip cream dispenser. Leave it to OXO to design it. Easy to clean, can be used for company. My only issue is that it doesn’t hold a full pint of cream. Why not, OXO?
customer_reviews.author: Alice Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was a good size creamer & I loved the lid & the convenience of pouring the milk. But didn’t last for more than a week. The bottom of the glass container came off while washing. Thank God I didn’t hurt myself. Very disappointing 👎
customer_reviews.author: Nusrat Ashraf

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed milk for coffee
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase. We found that kids were leaving an empty carton and we didn’t have milk for coffee. Now we can ensure we have a reserved batch set aside. Easy to see how much left. Easy to clean. Went with glass versus plastic. Feel better about using glass and can drop into dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: CONSUMER

customer_reviews.title: Looks sleek and functions well!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this sugar container! It looks nice and is an improvement from the cheap one I used to have. It's plastic, not glass, so while there's a low chance of breaking, you do need to wash it more as plastics aren't as clean as Glass. My one main complaint is the opener/pourer. It's very easy for sugar to get caught between the pourer and the wall of the lid, so it gets stuck closed or becomes a little hard to open/close. That's a tad annoying but it isn't inoperable, just requires some wiggling sometimes. I'm satisfied with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We got this for sugar for coffee in the mornings, mostly to keep the sugar from getting all over the counters. And it does exactly that! Easy to clean, except the little flip part that will eventually get little granuals, will need a little brush to get in there. I will buy this again if it ever breaks. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: wackerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item. As someone else said, the pull down mechanism that dispenses the sugar gets granules stuck in it which makes a CRUNCHY noise when it’s opens and closes. This has not become an issue as the dispenser works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Matieu Peritzu

customer_reviews.title: Yet another great OXO product.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE OXO. I have never gone wrong with an OXO kitchen product. Great grips, durable, highly functional--and never gimmicky. This fits into the other side of a wrought-iron napkin holder, along with glass salt/pepper shakers. Perfect for the table, easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: R.-Lorraine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to transfer my creamer from the paper carton into this pretty container. The paper cartons are difficult to disinfect. The top is a little harder to clean but if you use an old toothbrush it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neverdahl

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After wasting my money on other sugar dispensers, I am happy to have found the OXO good grips sugar dispenser. Sugar flows freely through the opening and since it can be closed, the sugar does not clump and stick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok....
customer_reviews.text: For an occasional brunch this is great, but I am using for everyday storage of my 1/2 and 1/2. The top/pop seal is just not as tight as I would like it. I feel like it just flips open. Again this won’t bother me if it was just an once in a while use thing, but everyday in the fridge makes me feel like I’m just leaving the creamer open.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clean design sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly dad who had trouble gripping my old dispenser. This is the perfect diameter. It's a low profile, simple design that works well. The cap screws on and off easily and the toggle pour spout is perfect. Excellent sugar dispenser and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: just not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This may be a personal opinion, but this product is close to it's description. It is way smaller than I thought (my fault for not measuring) and is not very easy to clean. Solid material though. Again, just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a glass sugar dispenser that broke when dropped. This one is better for use in an adult classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Boaz

customer_reviews.title: No problems with glass sugar dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: I use raw sugar in the dispenser and haven't had any problems. I have quite a few OXO kitchen items, but I wouldn't say this is a standout like some others. It is good quality and functional. No complaints about use.
customer_reviews.author: Groundoggy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs & cute on the counter
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser pairs with our Keurig perfectly on the counter. It has classic lines that compliment our decor and is easy to fill and dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so I can bring my cram to work and trade off when one is empty. The glass Kees it nice and cold in the fridge and I feel fresher than plastic. It is easy to clean as the stopper comes out so you can get around the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Augulis

customer_reviews.title: Sugar clumps
customer_reviews.text: I was sold by the ad copy that says 'side spout allows for easy, controlled pouring and minimizes moisture to help prevent sugar from clumping'. However, after filling it up the sugar clumped up within 24 hours. This is the problem I was trying to solve, so I'm not impressed. It's just a regular screw top - there's no rubber gasket to keep moisture out. In addition, sugar gets caught in the spout so it does not close 100%. Without good seals on the openings it's just another sugar dispenser - nothing special. Would not recommend unless you live in a very low humidity area.
customer_reviews.author: Books Forever

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: A slight drop and it breaks. Bottom comes right off. Major design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: minimal tight areas to clean, however, pretty easy to clean. soak with every time we empty the cream and it has stayed quite clean for several months. really nice product. like the glass canister.
customer_reviews.author: Drag-on

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other kind
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers do not clog like the more traditional dispensers and they seal better when closed. If there are bigger ones I'd suggest sizing up as these need frequent refilling at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Glass creamer is  perfect size and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I buy half and half by the quart for coffee and the container gets soft after a while. Putting the creamer in this glass container avoids that problem. Plus it is attractive enough for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Pucino

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but the seal doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much I bought another right away, but in just a couple weeks after that, the first no longer seals at the spout. It's constantly in a partially open state. It may be a one off issue. Waiting to see how the other one does over the next week or so.
customer_reviews.author: jma3974

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love OXO brand. This particular product served my purpose well. The only thing is that its capacity wasn’t enough to hold a can of evaporated milk even though I’ve used about 1/4. Hence the 4-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this every day and it's holding up well. The closable spout makes it so there's no spills and the plastic means it'll never shatter if it falls over. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: It works well except at times you will need to clean out the flip spout because sugar collects in there. It also collects around the lid so open it over a sink. I still like it though. Works either way.
customer_reviews.author: lnap

customer_reviews.title: Wish it held full pint; otherwise great. A-
customer_reviews.text: Added this glass creamer after I had to replace my OXO sugar dispenser. The plastic sugar creamer jumped out of my hand, hitting the floor, and the bottom blew out. I was very happy with the OXO glass sugar dispenser that I added this creamer. The only thing I would change about it is for it to hold a full pint of half and half. It’s a minor inconvenience at this point. Beyond that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Morticia03

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size.  Taller than Iphone 10XS Max
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size. I got other ones and they were too small. This is glass so it works even better. I should have bought this for my group home for sugar and creamer long time ago
customer_reviews.author: K.N Minnesota.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and simple
customer_reviews.text: I'd just love (and would award the remaining star) to have this in glass. The way it is it looks nice, but something seems missing when you pick it up, and it's a lot lighter than you would have expected, for it looks like glass, but is not. One might say that not having any mechanism for measuring standard quantity each time is a drawback; perhaps, but (a) if you read the reviews on such sugar dispensers you'll notice complaints about these same mechanisms malfunctioning, and (b) most people still use a teaspoon to stir the sugar after having added it to a beverage, so you could pour sugar directly into the teaspoon for measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ulyanov

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sugar dispenser that met my requirements... Glass, not plastic. Easy open/close spout. Easily dispense the desired amount (no pre-measured amount, or endless shaking). Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Speaker

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this dispenser as well as how easy it is the open the spout and pour out the sugar. The sugar does not clog up nor does the spout get stuck like other sugar dispensers I have used.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fugett

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: For years we used a jar of sugar and a spoon. Now we no longer need a spoon for dipping sugar in coffee. I love this dispenser and wish we bought this sooner. I love that is glass and not plastic for health reasons. Very pleased with this purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TheMooreFamily

customer_reviews.title: matching
customer_reviews.text: I have been so very happy with the creamer...size, function and quality....I ordered the sugar container. Very pleased with the purchase as, like the creamer, seals perfctly and holds enough not to have to fill it every other day or have my sugar get lumpy because of Florida humidity. Really think the manufacture is of great quality. Also shipped fast which is so very nice. Love receiving promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Functional, easy to use, nice style, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Simple, elegant cream dispenser. Well made. I got the glass one. If anything, I might worry about its lack of grippiness when wet due to condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Tesseract

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Humidity in the summer sometimes makes the sugar clump but one good smack on the counter and it’s back to business!! We are buying a second one for monkfruit!
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful!!!! Purchased to hold oat + regular milk for office expresso machine. Built with quality, looks great, very functional, help preserves the milks a long time with nice mouth seal. Highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MrAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Pretty container that gunks up daily!!! Then is difficult to unscrew to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CassavaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Glass product wrapped in microscopic sheet of film
customer_reviews.text: Glass sugar dispenser wrapped in a microscopic paper thin sheet of 'foam'... in a box. Astounded and heartened that it wasn't shattered... but packing was shockingly glaringly lacking.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: More attractive than functional
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I disliked this sugar dispenser because the spout jammed repeatedly, sugar getting caught in the grooves maybe. Now, I leave it open. Actually, it's stuck that way (probably grains of sugar) but I am not going to fight it. The sugar does get lumpy but it still pours. If a lump is big enough to block the spout, I put my thumb over the open spout and shake it to break up the lump.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: sticky spout
customer_reviews.text: At first this worked great however over time the sugar gums up the spout so it gets hard to open and close. Needs to be be cleaned pretty often so it doesn't get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Tallguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sugar Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of using a traditional sugar bowl, so I thought I would try this sugar dispenser. I love it. It is just more sanitary, and very practical. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Britt

customer_reviews.title: Oxo Good Grips
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy Oxo products because of the ease of use and features. However, this bottle broke as soon as I washed it and pour the milk in there. Milk was all over the floor in the kitchen. I was surprised that it didn't cut my hand. I returned it the same day for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my counters clean
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was just using the sweetener out of the bag to sweeten his coffee so I was CONSTANTLY cleaning up sugar off of the counter. This has remedied that situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amrit C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, cumbersome to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice option for dispensing sugar for coffee, etc. The only downside is that you need to manually open & close the spout, it doesn't open by leaning the canister on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Sugar Dispenser
product_meta.description: Size:Sugar| Style Name:PlasticA spoonful of sugar is always close at hand with the OXO Good Grips Sugar Dispenser. The side spout allows for easy, controlled pouring, making it perfect for coffee, cereal, fruit and more. The stainless steel accents make it great for countertop or table use. The clear, BPA-free body shows just how much sugar is left and the lid twists off to reveal a generous opening for easy refilling.
feature_bullets: Perfect for keeping sugar close at hand for coffee, cereal, fruits and more..
Clear, BPA free body shows fill level and lid twists off for easy refilling.

The OXO Better Guarantee: If you experience an issue with your OXO product, get in touch with us for a repair or replacement. We're grateful for the opportunity to learn from your experience, and we'll make it better!
Side spout allows for easy, controlled pouring and minimizes moisture to help prevent sugar from clumping.
Stainless steel accents provide kitchen-to-table appeal.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,363 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
